text: @WhiteHouse The majority of people, both in the #US & abroad, do not believe the lies whether it comes from this account or tRump’s account. #TrumpOwnsEveryDeath & that will be his legacy.  #COVID19 #CriminalNegligence #CrimesAgainstHumanity #TrumpGenocide
